scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 CD, 1 submission letter, 1 biographical and program note. Notes: Recording also contains Blowout (expanded) and Jam. Note on envelope (possibly not relevant): DN1.1 .WE. This piece was included in the same envelope with 4 other CDS: Behind the Blue Sky by Nickitas Demos, a CD of A Nonfunctional Teapot by Tim Reed, and two CDs of Mirrored Pursuit by Benjamin Williams. The submission letter and biographical and program note were received in a different original box from the CD in an envelope in Original Box 5. .
